CreateInstanceByApi.document: This example shows you how to create instance
CreateInstanceByApi.title: Create Instance

DescribeInstance.document: This example shows you how to query the  instance information by an instance ID.
DescribeInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwpg.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwpg-4dwmcu5n"
}
DescribeInstance.title: Describe Instance Information

DescribeInstanceInfo.document: This example shows you how to query the instance information.
DescribeInstanceInfo.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwpg.tencentcloudapi.com

<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwpg-4dwmcu5n"
}
DescribeInstanceInfo.title: Querying Instance Information

    "InstanceId": "cdwpg-4dwmcu5n"
}
